sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, movie_companies mc, cast_info ci
WHERE t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.production_year  <  2013 AND ci.person_id  <  1217455 AND ci.role_id  <  4
